scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp details.html dist/details.html && cp 404.html dist/404.html && cp jobCards.js dist/jobCards.js && cp data.json dist/data.json && cp testimonials.json dist/testimonials.json && cp testimonials.js dist/testimonials.js && cp teamMembers.json dist/teamMembers.json && cp details.js dist/details.js && cp teams.js dist/teams.js && cp script.js dist/script.js && cp carousel.js dist/carousel.js && cp -r assets dist/assets && npm run build-css
